Text: It says keygen is virus. 你耍我啊? Why can't you just make a patch that does not contain virus?
it's a false positive, but beside the point it won't work, it's not updated to that build. So stay on the last build until then.
Never mind it works, have fun and go ahead , thank you.

I already had this installed and working before but removed it for some reason I can't remember, I tried reinstalling it following the same instructions, but it will not accept my final activation code. It seems to have the serial and shit from the original installation stored away on some data file. I want to delete it but I cannot find it. Does anybody know where it would be?
